Name: my brother lives in a canyon
About the game: a short game set in southwestern america, my brother lives in a canyon is about two brothers reminiscing over short-wave radios. you play as jake, and begin walking down the trail to meet with your brother, tom. along the way you talk about old times. includes * a unique environment to explore. * a casual script that aims to tell an interesting story. * a 15-30 minute experience that can be completed in one sitting. * some Aesop Rock references. Hello From The Spirit (err...virtual?) World!
